__e: Do what you want with me, but I'm through with the games.

From now on you can eat whatever you want, but not from me!
Someone else decides if I get to see my daughter, sure, I'll talk about whatever they want, but...
You all can think of me what you will, but I know what I know.
Now you want to tell them or should I?
They can do whatever they like and we can't do a thing about it.
With this, you can go anywhere, do anything, kill anyone.
But I'll say it anyway. They can do what they want, and it'll be great.
If you guys want me to drop you off...
You know, however you want it put, that's fine with me.
That she'll be whatever they want her to be.
If you want to be out there, that's great. If you don't want to be out there, that's fine, too.
They want to wear monkey suits, fine!
But there's nothing to keep 'em from gettin' outta here.
Y'all wanna kill each other, y'all take that shit outside!

Well, we were thinking this was more of a family thing, but I-I guess if you want to make it kind of a home base,
